member.name: M:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleCache`1.GetInvalidHandle(System.Func{`0})
member.summary: Gets a cached, invalid handle. As the instance is cached, it should either never be Disposed or it should override to prevent disposal when the instance represents an invalid handle: returns .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleCache`1.IsCachedInvalidHandle(System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle)
member.summary: Gets whether the specified handle is invalid handle.
member.returns: true if is invalid handle; otherwise, false.
